title: ABES Institute of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking
meta_description: ABES Institute of Technology Admission 2024 is open for B.Tech and other degree courses based on JEE Main, NATA and CUET scores. Eligible candidates need to apply through UPTAC counselling. Check latest updates and news on ABES Institute of TechnologyAdmission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking

Section.name: About ABESIT
Section.description:
The ABES Institute of Technology was established in 2007-08 in the field of Technical and Management Education. The campus is spread over 17 acres of land and situated next to Crossing Republic, NH-24, near Lal Quan, Ghaziabad.
ABES Institute of Technology cutoff 2023 has been released by the UPTAC counselling. The institute offers admission to its UG & PG courses based on the respective entrance exam scores followed by UPTAC counselling. Given below are the ABES Institute of Technology cutoffs 2023 for the various UG & PG programs:
